pages.text: $(li)The Iron Pickaxe is the upgrade of the $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/stone_pickaxe)Stone Pickaxe$(/l).$(br)$(li)This pickaxe opens the possibility of mine new blocks as the Gold Ore, Redstone Ore, Diamond Ore, and Emerald Ore.

pages.name: Iron Pickaxe
pages.text: The Iron Pickaxe has more durability than the last one.
